tl_PH {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%a%N%f%N%d%N%b%N%h %s %e %r%N%%T %z%N%c%N" }
    }
    AmPmMarkers { 
            "AM",
            "PM",
    }
    CountryISBNNumber { "840" }
    CountryNumber { "840" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "PhP",
            "PHP ",
            ".",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss aa",
            "hh:mm:ss aa",
            "hh:mm:ss aa",
            "hh:mm:ss aa",
            "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
            "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss aa z",
            "MMMM/dd/yy",
            "MMMM/dd/yy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "Lin",
            "Lun",
            "Mar",
            "Miy",
            "Huw",
            "Biy",
            "Sab",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "Linggo",
            "Lunes",
            "Martes",
            "Miyerkoles",
            "Huwebes",
            "Biyernes",
            "Sabado",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Tagalog language locale for Philipines" }
        Source { "Rene Torres" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "Rene Torres, Pablo Saratxaga" }
        Email { "rgtorre@rocketmail.com, pablo@mandrakesoft.com" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Tagalog" }
        Territory { "Philipines" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.2" }
        Date { "2001-01-28" }
    }
    LanguageLibraryUse { "eng" }
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "Ene",
            "Peb",
            "Mar",
            "Abr",
            "May",
            "Hun",
            "Hul",
            "Ago",
            "Sep",
            "Okt",
            "Nob",
            "Dis",
            "",
    }
    MonthNames { 
            "Enero",
            "Pebrero",
            "Marso",
            "Abril",

            "Hunyo",
            "Hulyo",
            "Agosto",

            "Oktubre",
            "Nobiyembre",
            "Disyembre",

    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "Mr." }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "Miss." }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "Mrs." }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "Ms." }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;-\u00A4 #,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }
        Width { "210" }
        Units { "mm" }
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c (%a) %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "11" }
        InternationalPrefix { "1" }
    }
}
